title: How to get in the PBE?
body: I just want to test out things on the PBE with my friend but I can't sign in to the pbe like send in a request :( {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: It doesn't look like you've signed up for the PBE with the account you're posting from.  You can sign up to join through the [PBE Sign-up](https://pbesignup.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe) page.  I can't expedite applications, but you can check the [FAQ ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ)to see how applicants might be selected.  Best of luck!
